name: Recipe Sharing App
description: Social platform for sharing and discovering cooking recipes
app_goal: Connect food enthusiasts and help them discover new recipes
target_user: Home cooks, food bloggers, culinary students
main_problem: Difficulty finding reliable recipes and sharing cooking experiences
design_preferences: Instagram-like interface with high-quality food photography
additional_requirements: Recipe rating system, shopping lists, meal planning

name: Expense Tracker
description: Personal finance management tool with budget tracking and analytics
app_goal: Help individuals manage their personal finances and budgets
main_problem: Lack of visibility into spending patterns and budget management
design_preferences: Simple, intuitive interface with clear financial visualizations
additional_requirements: Bank integration, spending categories, financial reports
